text: The Cable TV Privacy Act of 198447 U.S.C. ยง 551. became effective on December 29, 1984. It provides for the privacy of personal information. It prohibits cable TV providers from disclosing personally identifiable information. It also allows users to view and verify their information. ==References== Category:1984 in the United States Category:United States federal legislation Category:Privacy
title: Cable TV Privacy Act
